Package com.craigwoodcock.fishingapp.controller.webController

package com.craigwoodcock.fishingapp.controller.webController
Web controllers package handling all web interface endpoints for the Fishing Application.

This package contains controllers that:

  • Handle web page requests
  • Return view templates
  • Process form submissions
  • Manage session-based authentication
  • Handle web-specific business logic

Web controllers use Spring MVC's view resolution to render templates and handle traditional web application flows. Authentication is handled through form-based login as configured in the security package.

These controllers manage the user interface aspects of the application, including:

  • User dashboard
  • Registration and login pages
  • Profile management
  • Administrative interfaces
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Craig Woodcock
